title: Tech Talk. Episode 21.
brief_description: Contains four programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the necessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. Presented by Michael Schildberger the topics covered are as follows:- postal clerk, auto electrician, social worker and leisure alternatives.
